data.message: We payed Rita Ora Money to tell you which one of her favourite cokes are. She definitely picked the one which we're advertising here. Listen to this person being paid to tell you what we want her to tell you. Rita Ora is a great mouthpiece for coke. Go and buy coke now knowing that we pay celebrities who take our money to tell you which one of our drinks are best. The one we're advertising. Buy our stuff. This person has been paid to tell you to buy our stuff. K thx bye.

replies.message: I prefer the coke from my mate down the road.
Tastes more like coke, looks more like coke. Goes up my nose really nicely too.
